item.description:
Herb has been teaching relationship communication courses for 30 years. Even though most communication is affected by personality more than gender, gender differences play a major role. Herb will present information from his life and work and also based on a very revealing book "We Have to Talk" by Samuel Shem and Janet Surrey, a Cambridge couple. We will also have a gender dialogue in the group after the information is presented. Don't miss this special event!


7 to 9:30pm

$40, sliding scale to 20

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert with over 20 years experience teaching personality types workshops He is a relationship therapist and coach, working with individuals, couples and families, leads trainings in organizations and gives presentations and workshops throughout the world.

www.herbpearce.com (workshop schedule) and to sign up for his newsletter
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Gender Dialogues - Effective Ways for Men and Women to Communicate
